summary: This is a joke MOD of \"2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)\".
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Joke MOD - Monolith (ver 1.1)
----------------

This is a joke MOD of \"2001: A Space Odyssey (1968)\".


Joke MOD - Silent Running
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16027
Joke MOD - UFO v1.1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15816
Joke MOD - Killer Tomato
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16169
Joke MOD - The Seven Skeleton Warriors
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16315
Joke MOD - The Time Machine v1.1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16500
Joke MOD - Robby the Robot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16902
Joke MOD - The Thing
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17436


---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.5.24.0


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. 


---
Ver 1.1 :

Monolith is now seamless.
Sound of Monolith was added.

Ver 1.0 :

You can receive the divine protection of all the altars at once. 

Blessing of Akatosh
Blessing of Arkay
Blessing of Dibella
Blessing of Julianos
Blessing of Kynareth
Blessing of Mara
Blessing of Nocturnal
Blessing of Stendarr
Blessing of Talos
Blessing of Zenithar

---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela

Monolith is now seamless.
Sound of Monolith was added.
